channel.title: Docker on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: Draw.io
item.description: I’ve created a docker-compose.yml file for to run draw.io: draw: restart: always image: fjudith/drawio ports: - "${IP_ADDRESS}8180:8080" depends_on: - nginx-proxy environment: - VIRTUAL_HOST=draw,draw.

item.title: docker-compose handling circular dependency
item.description: In docker-compose files you can have different keywords to indicate run time dependency.
